value: Fan leaf. Linen embroidered in white on white in the Swiss Appenzell style. A pastoral scene with a shepherd tending a flock of sheep, in front of a barn and a tree. Flanked by large cornucopias from which spill floral sprays in scrolling patterns, birds and two large praying mantises.
